question: Which country was the location of the event "Operation Cold Chop"?
explanation: Ghana was the location of the event "Operation Cold Chop". The government of Kwame Nkrumah was overthrown by a coup by the Ghana Armed Forces codenamed "Operation Cold Chop" on 24 February 1966. This occurred while Nkrumah was abroad with Zhou Enlai in the People's Republic of China.
